name: One Night with Spong 2: Christmas Cuckoldry
name_original: One Night with Spong 2: Christmas Cuckoldry
description:
THIS IS A JOKE GAME!!!!

A month after the night you won at Spong Squormp's game, it is christmas eve!!!!! But that's not all. Spong has returned, with his slaves friends, and they will stop at nothing to kill you!!!!

PLAY THE ORIGINAL: https://shoodigity.itch.io/spong

HOW 2 PLAY!!!!!!!!!!

When Spong appears, move to the other room

When Scooter (Random-ass fish) appears, click on him

When Rapist (Squidward) appears, search for him on the cameras or move around yourself
